The Vegas Slots is all colors.
{1}: Roll a d10 three times.
[b]Three Matching Numbers Less than 7 |[/b] You gain life equal to the matched number.
[b]Three Matching Numbers Greater than 7 |[/b] The Vegas Slots deals damage to any target equal or the matched number.
[b]Three Ascending Consecutive Numbers |[/b] Draw cards equal to the highest individual die result.
[b]777 |[/b] If the result of each die is exactly 7, you win the game.
cards.notes:
!tag .5 !tag cc10
The possible results out of 1000:
<7: 6
>7: 3
Ascending: 8
123, 234, 345, 456, 567, 678, 789, 8910
777: 1

Odds are 18/1000 to get an effect. (1.8%)
Though the odds might be lower if the ascending consecutive numbers have to be rolled in order. (not clear)

!tag cc10 !tag marlinx

The total result equalling to 7 is actually a 1/6 chance, so you could actually roll a single d6 to find the same result.

You can think about it as it doesn't matter what you roll for the first die, the second die always has one result that adds up to 7 when added to the first. aka a 1/6 chance.

[i]Demon King's Death Lair[/i] — Sacrifice all lands you control: Return Draka-Death from your graveyard to the battlefield, except it enters with seven -1/-1 counters on it. Activate only if you control six or more lands.
cards.notes:
!tag dns !tag lilypadms !tag cc10 !tag word

D. Death (his real name is Draka-Death because he's half dragon and half demon) is the master of death magic and destruction from Hell. He taught Rakdos and all the other big demons how to be demons, and using even 1/5th of his power he can easily destroy any angel or plainswalker who tries to stop him from ruling hell like a god. This is all stuff that I, swonk, wrote in my fan-fiction which I keep closely guarded and protected. I may try to deny it exists, but I want to avow now that I think my writing and my OCs are superior and worthy of nothing but respect. They are very real, and if you want to fight me about it please do it publicly in the CCC thread for everyone to see.
